title: 53: Serving SPOOKY with Roz Drezfalez (Paranormal Pt. 2)
itunes:title: 53: Serving SPOOKY with Roz Drezfalez (Paranormal Pt. 2)
description:
On today’s haunting episode The Broads are joined by the fabulous drag queen, Rox Drezfalez! Roz hosts a paranormal podcast and gives The Broads all the ghosty tea! They chat ouija boards, demons, personal hauntings, creepy houses, share some stories from the #broadsquad that will give you chills, and much more! 
Follow Roz at @rozdrezfalez and make sure to tune into her hilarious and hair-raising podcast, “Ghosted! by Roz Drezfalez”.
Chatty Broads is recorded and produced @theblueroommedia www.theblueroommedia.com (http://www.theblueroommedia.com/)
***AMOUR VERT: Amour Vert is offering our podcast listeners 15% off your first order when you go to http://shopgreenlove.com/CHATTY.
*** GREEN CHEF: For a total of $75 off, that’s $25 off each of your first 3 boxes, go to GreenChef.us/ (http://greenchef.us/) CHATTY75. 
*** ARTICLE: Go to Article.com/chatty (http://article.com/chatty) to get $50 off your first purchase of $100 or more!
